DOC.brief_title: Study Comparing TVT With TVT-SECUR Treatment Stress Urinary Incontinence
DOC.criteria: Urinary incontinence symptom Urodynamic stress incontinence confirm multichannel urodynamic test Age least 21 year Desires surgical correction stress urinary incontinence Postvoid residual volume > 100cc Detrusor overactivity preoperative multichannel urodynamic test History previous synthetic , biologic fascial suburethral sling Desires future childbearing History bleed diathesis current anticoagulation therapy Current genitourinary fistula urethral diverticulum Reversible cause incontinence ( i.e . drug effect ) Contraindication surgery
